fullText: Jim Parsons and Katie Holmes shine in this beautifully staged revival of Thornton Wilder's timeless classic about life, love and loss in small-town America.
bwwExcerpt: So, why, if it is Our town, is director Kenny Leon’s staging of “Our Town” among the most uninvolving and anemic I have ever seen?
dtliExcerpt: Jim Parsons and Katie Holmes shine in this beautifully staged revival of Thornton Wilder's timeless classic about life, love and loss in small-town America.
showScoreExcerpt: "Despite the random contemporary touches, the actors get so mired"

keyPhrases.quote: among the most uninvolving and anemic I have ever seen
